titleStmt.title: Christmass revived: or An ansvver to certain objections made against the observation of a day in memory of our Saviour Christ his birth. By John Reading. M.A. And one of the prebends of Christs-Church in Canterbury.
titleStmt.author: Reading, John, 1588-1667.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John Andrewes and John Garway, and are to be sold at the White-Lion near Py-Corner,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
